metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26530 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
swaylock before 1.6 allows attackers to trigger a crash and achieve unlocked access to a Wayland compositor.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26530` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

swaylock - 1.6-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: swaylock package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6-2').
